title: Stylish China City Stay in Downtown Huangshan
description: Found where relaxation and exploration meet, Crowne Plaza Huangshan Yucheng, an IHG Hotel is the only international hotel connecting visitors directly with Huangshan downtown. Designed in a unique Huizhou architectural style, finished with fresh, modern touches, this destination boasts an array of sleek yet comfortable rooms and suites. Take a walk around Tunxi Old Street, explore the Yellow Mountain, and return home to breathtaking views of the Xin’an River and fine dining at Yun Hai Chinese Restaurant or Riverside Café.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Huangshan Yucheng, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No.1 Huizhou Road, Tunxi, Huangshan 245000, Mainland China

title: Stylish Hyatt China City Stay in Huangshan with Indoor Pool & Onsite Restaurant
description:
Experience the magic of China's ancient Anhui province with a luxurious Hyatt stay, conveniently located near the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Mount Huangshan. This is the perfect base to explore the mountain's stunning granite peaks, ancient pine trees and hot springs. After a day of exploration, retreat to the hotel's indoor pool or indulge in Anhui cuisine at the onsite restaurant.

Find yourself within easy reach of the charming ancient villages of Xidi and Hongcun, both UNESCO World Heritage Sites known for their well-preserved Ming and Qing dynasty architecture. The hotel also offers easy access to the vibrant Tunxi Old Street, where you can sample local delicacies, browse traditional handicrafts and immerse yourself in the local culture.
offer_address: 26 Qiyun Avenue, Xintan Town, Tunxi District, Huangshan 245061, China
